action.des: Defensive Substitution: Aaron Miles replaces third baseman Scott Spiezio, batting 7th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Jason Isringhausen replaces Russ Springer, batting 8th.
Defensive switch from second base to third base for Miguel Cairo.

atbat.des: Cliff Floyd grounds out, second baseman Aaron Miles to first baseman Albert Pujols.
Mark DeRosa singles on a line drive to left fielder So Taguchi.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Daryle Ward replaces Jason Kendall.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Sam Fuld replaces Mark DeRosa.

atbat.des: Daryle Ward grounds into double play, first baseman Albert Pujols to shortstop Brendan Ryan to first baseman Albert Pujols. Sam Fuld out at 2nd.
